cause.description:
We are a cause to save the rarest species of Rockers...The EMOS!Those kids with the long fringes over thier eyes,the dyed black hair,the thick rimmed glasses,the masscarra,the piercings and tight clothing.They're not freaks!Emos are people to!And we've got to stand up for these teary little kids!
1. Emos Should Be Treated With Respect And Not Have Stones Thrown At Them!
cause.name: Save The Emo
